track.name: Some Lessons
comments: think i'm in love :P ... voice like melting drops of honey :)

Some lessons we learn the hard way 
Some lessons don't come easy 
That's the price we have to pay
Its my biggest pleasure to enjoy Melodys wonderful voice.
So calm  so  beautiful .. i love  a song who tells a story ..
często sobie nucę ten utwór, mądre słowa :)
Estrema!!!!!!   pizzica le corde della tua anima.........
Where is my bottle of wine...
Amazing. Now that's how to sing.
absolutely wonderful... i want more of this....
no acabo de encajarla..  a veces es como Norah Jones y de golpe quizá quizá a Diana.. pero hay que dar una oportunidad de escucha a todos..
